results.title: Metformin generates profound alterations in systemic and tumor immunity with associated antitumor effects
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ would generate a shift in immunity unfavorable to @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ growth and tested this hypothesis in a preclinical model of @<m>DISEASE_Head_and_Neck_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006258 @@@head and neck cancer@@@.
